issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Hi there,

I've written a number of modules that have worked fine in 1.5.1, but now have issues with SBJSON and the collection of JSON classes since upgrading to 1.6.

I notice that there is a top-level to do in the template to fix the heavily customised SBJSON at a later date. Can I suggest that this is a high priority?

At this point I'm not entirely sure how I would have to modify the modules I've written to accommodate the Ti customisations. I've invested a lot of time and effort in my module code, so I will have to stick to 1.5.1 until this is resolved.

An updated date for a fix would be appreciated.

Thanks,

Byron

{html}
fields.summary: Ti Implementation of SBJSON and other JSON files breaks third party modules

comments.body:
{html}

Any update on this?
I see the top level TODO is still in 1.6.1

{html}
Closing ticket due to the time passed, lack of information and lack of progress. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
